summary.p: The following sample will show how the Query class can be used to execute a query against .NET objects.

section.title: Prerequisites

ol.li: Create a new C# Windows Application
Add a reference to the NQuery.dll assembly
Add a reference to the NQuery namespace (using NQuery;)
Place a DataGridView component on the main form
